# Examples

```bash
➜  examples git:(main) ✗ go build
➜  examples git:(main) ✗ ./examples -help
Usage of ./examples:
  -n int
        number of row (or column) of the positive-definite matrix A (default 10)
  -seed uint
        seed (default 42)
  -tol float
        stopping criterion (default 1e-06)
➜  examples git:(main) ✗ ./examples -n 6 -seed 2024
```
